main event: On March 7, 1960, a series of bright lights were reported streaking across the sky over the Eastern United States, with sightings spanning from Florida to Ohio.
interesting points: The lights were described as brilliant white and orange-red in color, moving rapidly in a pattern,They appeared to break up into three separate sightings as they traveled,Several reports came from military personnel and air traffic control towers,An Air Force official speculated the lights might be from a re-entering meteor or satellite,Many witnesses said the lights left no vapor trail and emitted no sound.
sighted object: brilliant white lights breaking up into separate sightings
witness description: military personnel and citizens across several states, including Florida and Ohio
